name: Zanskaran Viper
description: The Zanskaran Viper is a large, formidable beast with exceptional physical strength and a powerful bite.
memorable: Its bite has a debilitating poison effect that can blind prey.
goals: To hunt and incapacitate its prey.
relations: Related to various other large predatory beasts.
environment: Typically found in areas conducive to ambush hunting.
strengths: High Constitution and a potent poisonous bite.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, making it basic in strategy.
attacks: Powerful bite that can deal piercing damage and cause poison.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to poison its prey, leading to blindness and additional damage.
additional_information: Has a strong physical attack capability.
Requires a DC 13 Constitution saving throw to resist its poison.
Can deal additional poison damage while the target is poisoned.
Is primarily a predator, relying on ambush tactics.
test_queries: large poisonous snake with a deadly bite
predatory viper that blinds its prey
dangerous beast with stunning poison attack
formidable snake that attacks from ambush
